    1: import numpy as np
    2: import pytest
    3: 
    4: import pandas as pd
    5: import pandas._testing as tm
    6: 
    7: 
    8: @pytest.mark.parametrize("na", [None, np.nan, pd.NA])
    9: def test_setitem_missing_values(na):
   10:     arr = pd.array([True, False, None], dtype="boolean")
   11:     expected = pd.array([True, None, None], dtype="boolean")
   12:     arr[1] = na
   13:     tm.assert_extension_array_equal(arr, expected)
